name: Notion Startup Job Board
description: The all-in-one solution to attract the best talentsThe Startup Job Board Notion Template is the perfect solution for businesses looking to streamline their hiring process. This template includes an automated application system that allows candidates to easily submit their resumes and cover letters, and for recruiters to efficiently manage and organize all applications in one place.Customize your careers page to match your brand's look and feel, and showcase all of your available job opportunitie
features: Beautiful careers page website with mission statement, meet the team, benefits, etc.; Post an unlimited amount of jobs; Job description template; Automated application form; Manage all applications in your Notion backend
